title: Textile, early 20th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed on plain weave
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt, from the textile collection of Mrs. Abram Stevens Hewitt
description: Piece of glazed chintz printed in polychrome on a white ground. Design of light brown serpentine forms is overprinted with small sprays of flowers. Surrounding spaces are filled with large-scale rose, peonies, etc.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, early 20th century.
early 20th century. Medium: cotton
Technique: printed on plain weave. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt, from the textile collection of Mrs. Abram Stevens Hewitt. 1931-4-75.
